verbose_text: We subjected flies overexpressing fkh RNAi and uninduced controls to DR, and we found that DR promoted longevity in both (XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY A and S3B; at 0.5x versus 1x yeast concentration, for + RU486 condition median survival +18%, p = 1.02 x 10 -10, and for -RU486 condition median survival +3%, p = 0.03, respectively).
evidence: DR promoted longevity in both ( XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY A and S3B
